    • Method Detail

      • match

        public int match(Set<String> searchFields)
        Description copied from interface: KeyInfo
        Determines how close the gives fields match the index descriptor. The scale is on 0-200. This would reach 200 in case all value fields and index fields are a 100% match. The calculation is N (number of matching fields) / field.size + (N / fields.size) * included matching columns.
        Specified by:
        match in interface KeyInfo
        Parameters:
        searchFields - The fields to check for matching
        Returns:
        The matching on a scale from 0-200
